column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9ec030622f6c12c75f98b6dcd0c18bd9ef1fc223 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK? This should be mergable as-is; no longer a preview.\n
